recipes.name: Lahmacun
recipes.description: Lahmacun is a Turkish dish made by spreading a meat mixture on a thin dough.
instructions: Prepare the dough and let it rest.
Roll out the dough and spread the mixture on top.

recipes.name: Paella
recipes.description: Paella is a rice dish originally from Valencia, Spain.
instructions: Add the saffron and water, and let it cook.

recipes.name: Sushi
recipes.description: Sushi is a Japanese dish typically made with vinegared rice and various ingredients such as raw fish and vegetables.
instructions: Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt into the cooked rice.
Spread the rice on nori and add fish and vegetables.
Roll the sushi and cut into pieces.

recipes.name: Tacos
recipes.description: Tacos are a traditional Mexican dish made with a folded or rolled tortilla filled with various ingredients.
instructions: Place the meat and other ingredients on the tortilla.

recipes.name: Pizza
recipes.description: Pizza is an Italian dish made with a thin dough base topped with various ingredients.
instructions: Prepare the dough and let it rest.
Roll out the dough and spread tomato sauce on top.

recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Pad Thai is a Thai dish made with rice noodles, often served with shrimp, chicken, or tofu.
instructions: Mix all ingredients together and add tamarind sauce.

recipes.name: Ratatouille
recipes.description: Ratatouille is a French vegetable dish made with eggplant, zucchini, tomatoes, and bell peppers.
instructions: Sauté the onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add the other vegetables and cook.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Butter Chicken is an Indian dish made with chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Sauté garlic and ginger in butter.
Stir in the cream and mix well.
